gear.title: Triton Audio FetHead

gear.title: R√òDE PSA1
gear.description: A sturdy studio arm. Can easily handle heavier microphones.

gear.title: R√òDECaster Pro
gear.description: The perfect audio interface/mixer solution! More than enough inputs, Aphex integrated (real-time audio processing), and even 8 programmable sound pads üò≤!

gear.title: 16‚Äù MacBook Pro M1 Max 2021
gear.description: 10 core CPU | 32 core GPU | 32GB RAM | 1TB SSD

gear.title: LG Ultrafine 27UQ850-W
gear.description: A really nice 27‚Äù 4K monitor with 98% P3 color gamut. It's a great monitor for photographers, streamers, and graphic designers.

gear.title: Keychron Q1 Version 2
gear.description: This is my first mechanical keyboard. It's a Keychron Q1 Version 2 with Gateron G Pro Brown switches. I got the Carbon Black - A color.

gear.title: Logitech MX Master 3s for Mac
gear.description: A great mouse for Mac users. It doesn't charge upside down üòÖ, and you can instantly switch between computers!

gear.title: Sony a6300
gear.description: An industry standard. It shoots 6k and then it downscales it to 4k. You get sharper 4k that way.

gear.title: Sigma 16mm f1.4
gear.description: Also an industry standard. One of the best lenses out there.

gear.title: Elgato Camlink 4k
gear.description: This connects my Sony a6300 to my iMac, so I can use it as a webcam.

gear.title: Elgato Multi Mount System
gear.description: I've got two Master Mount L arms for the ring lights, and one Solid Arm for my camera, just like on the picture.

gear.title: Subtel PW20 7.3 V Power Adapter
gear.description: This is a phantom battery adapter for my a6300. It makes it think that it's a battery, so you can use it for longer time.

gear.title: Desview T3 Teleprompter
gear.description: A decent teleprompter that supports wide lenses. Also comes with a bluetooth remote!

gear.title: MotionGrey Ergo2 Standing Desk
gear.description: A nice and budget friendly standing desk. I've got the 55x24 version.

gear.title: MotionGrey M Series High Back Chair
gear.description: My last chair was a gaming chair. I'll never buy a gaming chair again. I got this one along with the standing desk. So far it's a great chair.
